0.1.name: wordpress/uqast-embed
0.1.description:
This simple plugin enables oEmbed support for the uQast Media Player with full SEO and lead generation capabilities.

To add a video to a WordPress blog post just use a similar method to a YouTube video

  • Copy the URL to the page on uQast or the oEmbed code suggested from within the player if it is an offsite location.

http://www.uqast.com/andy/uQast-Demo

  • Paste the link into the WordPress editor on its own line or between [embed]http://www.uqast.com/andy/uQast-Demo[/embed] shortcodes

The current video embed code is saved as meta data and displayed within the post when the page or post is saved.

To update the embed code of the displayed video, simply resave the post or page.

If you want to know more about uQast

uQast In
